segments.text: Mary , come here . I've found the book our teacher recommended us to buy last week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? How much is it ? Oh , it's 42 yuan ! How expensive !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know , it is the best seller for this year . It has had its fifth impression since its publication early this year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How come ? I have never seen such a popular book before .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wait a minute . I found there were two printings . The paperback books must be much cheaper .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are right . Let's buy the cheaper one .
segments.speaker: S2
